item.title: Looking for a Mentor or Potential Investor?
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description: Mary Boyle in Enterprise Ireland in Sligo has contacted us to let everyone know that a very experienced person from the Irish tech sector is looking to mentor and potentially invest in high potential startups. If this is of interest to you, then put together a one-page overview of your biz and send it toÂ Mary [...]
item.content:encoded:
Mary Boyle in Enterprise Ireland in Sligo has contacted us to let everyone know that a very experienced person from the Irish tech sector is looking to mentor and potentially invest in high potential startups.

If this is of interest to you, then put together a one-page overview of your biz and send it toÂ Mary DOT Boyle AT enterprise-ireland DOT com along with all your contact details.

UPDATE: The person in questionÂ is going through all the proposals he has been sent. He is delighted with the level of interest & the potential in the companies. He doesnâ€™t want any more submssions until he evaluates the ones he has. Â He will get back directly to companies he is interested in talking to.
